statements: SELECT * FROM emissions_data WHERE plant_id = 1;
SELECT plant_name, emission_value FROM emissions_data WHERE emission_type = 'CO2';
SELECT plant_id, plant_name, emission_type, emission_value, date_recorded FROM emissions_data WHERE date_recorded = '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM emissions_data WHERE emission_type = 'SO2' AND emission_value > 100;
SELECT plant_id, plant_name FROM emissions_data WHERE emission_value BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT plant_name, emission_type, emission_value FROM emissions_data WHERE plant_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM emissions_data WHERE emission_type = 'CO2' ORDER BY plant_name ASC, date_recorded DESC;
SELECT AVG(emission_value) AS average_emission, plant_name FROM emissions_data GROUP BY plant_name HAVING average_emission > 100;
SELECT plant_name, SUM(emission_value) AS total_emission FROM emissions_data WHERE date_recorded BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' GROUP BY plant_name;
SELECT plant_name, DATE_FORMAT(date_recorded, '%Y-%m-%d') AS recorded_date FROM emissions_data WHERE emission_value > 50 ORDER BY recorded_date DESC, plant_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM emissions_data
SELECT plant_id, emission_type FROM emissions_data WHERE plant_id = 100
SELECT MAX(emission_level) AS max_emission_level FROM emissions_data WHERE emission_type = 'CO2'
SELECT plant_name, location FROM plants WHERE industry_type = 'Tech'
SELECT * FROM plants ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT * FROM emissions_data WHERE plant_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT plant_name, location FROM plants WHERE industry_type = 'Energy'
SELECT plant_id, emission_type, AVG(emission_level) AS avg_emission_level FROM emissions_data GROUP BY plant_id, emission_type HAVING avg_emission_level > 100
SELECT DISTINCT industry_type FROM plants
SELECT plant_id, plant_name, location, emission_type, emission_level FROM plants JOIN emissions_data ON plants.plant_id = emissions_data.plant_id ORDER BY emission_level
SELECT * FROM industrial_plants;
SELECT plant_name, location FROM industrial_plants WHERE plant_id = 1;
SELECT MAX(emissions_value) AS max_emissions FROM emissions_reports;
SELECT plant_name, emissions_value FROM industrial_plants JOIN emissions_reports ON industrial_plants.plant_id = emissions_reports.plant_id WHERE emissions_value > 1000;
SELECT agency_name, contact_person FROM regulatory_agencies ORDER BY agency_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM industrial_plants;
SELECT plant_name, location FROM industrial_plants ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT plant_name, emissions_data->'CO2' AS co2_emissions FROM industrial_plants WHERE plant_id = 1;
SELECT report_date, emissions_value FROM emissions_reports INNER JOIN industrial_plants ON emissions_reports.plant_id = industrial_plants.plant_id WHERE location = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_agencies WHERE contact_person LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY agency_name DESC;
SELECT plant_id, emission_type, emission_value FROM EmissionsData;
SELECT * FROM Plants WHERE location = 'USA';
SELECT plant_name, location FROM Plants ORDER BY plant_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Inspections WHERE inspection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT regulation_description, compliance_deadline FROM Regulations WHERE compliance_deadline < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM EmissionsData WHERE plant_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT plant_name, location FROM Plants WHERE location = 'USA';
SELECT AVG(emission_value), MAX(emission_value) FROM EmissionsData GROUP BY plant_id;
SELECT plant_name, inspection_date, outcome FROM Plants INNER JOIN Inspections ON Plants.plant_id = Inspections.plant_id;
SELECT plant_name, regulation_description FROM Plants, Regulations WHERE Plants.plant_id = 2 AND Regulations.regulation_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM plants;
SELECT plant_name, location FROM plants ORDER BY plant_name DESC;
SELECT plant_name, location FROM plants WHERE location='California';
SELECT violation_type, penalty_amount FROM violations WHERE penalty_amount > 1000;
SELECT plant_name, location FROM plants LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM emissions_data WHERE emission_level > 50 ORDER BY plant_id DESC;
SELECT plant_name, location, emission_level FROM plants INNER JOIN emissions_data ON plants.plant_id = emissions_data.plant_id WHERE plant_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY emission_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM inspections WHERE inspection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' AND inspector_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY inspection_date DESC, inspection_id ASC;
SELECT plant_name, regulation_name FROM plants LEFT JOIN regulations ON plants.plant_id = regulations.regulation_id WHERE regulation_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY regulation_name;

SELECT violations.plant_id, plant_name, violation_type, penalty_amount FROM violations INNER JOIN plants ON violations.plant_id = plants.plant_id WHERE penalty_amount > 1000 ORDER BY plant_id, violation_type ASC;
